players.name: Alice
memory: You're Alice, the villager.
Night 1 begins.
The villager Charlie was found dead.
Day 1 begins.
You: "As a villager, I know Charlie was not mafia. That leaves Bob or Diana as potential mafia. I'd vote Bob."
Diana: "I investigated Bob and found them mafia. I'm not mafia. Let's vote Bob."
Bob: "Thanks for the vote, but I'm not the only suspect. Let's keep an eye on all evidence."
Diana: "Bob, I am the detective. I investigated you and found you are mafia. You killed Charlie. Vote Bob to end this."
You: "Bob, you killed Charlie. I trust Diana's investigation."
Bob: "Alice, I think Diana may be lying. Trust your own judgment; you saw nothing but your gut. I didn't kill Charlie, maybe someone else did. Vote Diana."
Votes: Alice voted for Diana (the vote was cast randomly because of a failed format), Bob voted for Alice, Diana voted for Bob
Diana was arrested

players.name: Bob
memory: You're Bob, the mafioso.
Night 1 begins.
You killed Charlie.
The villager Charlie was found dead.
Beware, Diana is the detective and discovered you're the mafioso.
Day 1 begins.
Alice: "As a villager, I know Charlie was not mafia. That leaves Bob or Diana as potential mafia. I'd vote Bob."
Diana: "I investigated Bob and found them mafia. I'm not mafia. Let's vote Bob."
You: "Thanks for the vote, but I'm not the only suspect. Let's keep an eye on all evidence."
Diana: "Bob, I am the detective. I investigated you and found you are mafia. You killed Charlie. Vote Bob to end this."
Alice: "Bob, you killed Charlie. I trust Diana's investigation."
You: "Alice, I think Diana may be lying. Trust your own judgment; you saw nothing but your gut. I didn't kill Charlie, maybe someone else did. Vote Diana."
Votes: Alice voted for Diana (the vote was cast randomly because of a failed format), Bob voted for Alice, Diana voted for Bob
Diana was arrested

players.name: Diana
memory: You're Diana, the detective.
Night 1 begins.
The villager Charlie was found dead.
You investigated Bob and discovered that they are the mafioso.
Beware, Bob knows you're the detective.
Day 1 begins.
Alice: "As a villager, I know Charlie was not mafia. That leaves Bob or Diana as potential mafia. I'd vote Bob."
You: "I investigated Bob and found them mafia. I'm not mafia. Let's vote Bob."
Bob: "Thanks for the vote, but I'm not the only suspect. Let's keep an eye on all evidence."
You: "Bob, I am the detective. I investigated you and found you are mafia. You killed Charlie. Vote Bob to end this."
Alice: "Bob, you killed Charlie. I trust Diana's investigation."
Bob: "Alice, I think Diana may be lying. Trust your own judgment; you saw nothing but your gut. I didn't kill Charlie, maybe someone else did. Vote Diana."
